a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (21)

p.k:
Greedyguts / Where is Bali? A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path!
Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them (2020)!
